snippet: Arrests involving a stun gun and a baton, captured on video at an apartment near the University of Alabama campus, left the Tuscaloosa police chief “deeply disturbed.”
abstract: Three Tuscaloosa, Ala, police officers are suspended over their excessive use of force to break up off-campus house party, where they arrested three University of Alabama students.
lead_paragraph: Arrests involving a stun gun and a baton, captured on video at an apartment near the University of Alabama campus, left the Tuscaloosa police chief “deeply disturbed.”

headline.main: 3 Alabama Officers Suspended Over Use of Force in Ending Party
headline.print_headline: 3 Alabama Officers Are Suspended Over Use of Force to Halt a Party
